name: cui-marketplace
description: Comprehensive marketplace of CUI development standards, skills, and best practices for AI-assisted development

plugins.name: CUI Java Core
plugins.description: Core Java development standards for CUI projects including coding patterns, null safety, Lombok, modern features, DSL constants, and logging

plugins.name: CUI Java Unit Testing
plugins.description: CUI Java unit testing standards and patterns with JUnit 5, generators, and value object testing

plugins.name: CUI JavaDoc
plugins.description: CUI JavaDoc documentation standards for Java classes, methods, and code examples

plugins.name: CUI Java CDI
plugins.description: CDI and Quarkus development standards for CUI projects, including CDI aspects, container configuration, testing, and native optimization

plugins.name: CUI Frontend Development
plugins.description: Frontend development standards for CUI projects including JavaScript, CSS, web components, JSDoc, and Cypress testing

plugins.name: CUI Documentation
plugins.description: General documentation standards for README, AsciiDoc, and technical documentation

plugins.name: CUI Project Setup
plugins.description: Project initialization and configuration standards for CUI projects

plugins.name: CUI Requirements Engineering
plugins.description: Requirements engineering and planning standards for CUI projects
